isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - APS/IVS PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IDLE VALIDATION SWITCH - APS/IVS EXTENDED SYSTEM DESCRIPTION

svcproc.title: APS/IVS EXTENDED SYSTEM DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: Navistar electronic engines use an electronic accelerator pedal assembly that includes a Accelerator Position Sensor (APS) and Idle Validation Switch (IVS). These two functions are integrated into one component mounted on the pedal. The accelerator pedal assembly is serviceable to the extent that the APS/IVS switch can be replaced without replacing the complete assembly.

The engine Electronic Control Module (ECM) determines the position of the accelerator pedal by processing the input signals from the Accelerator Position Sensor (APS) and Idle Validation Switch (IVS).
